TopicTitle: The Offical KSP Hype Train (Driven by the Planet Destroyer)

Articles.Content: Hi. This is the hype train for all KSP updates. I'm the driver. NOT Gregorx Mun.
There is no designated hype train person, and we have new threads for each update, but only close to update time. Which, since we just had one, will not be for a while.
